metadata.title: USN-3794-1 -- MoinMoin vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that MoinMoin incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3794-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-moinmoin - 1.9.7-1ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
